pre_caption: The video begins with a full, forward-facing shot of a snowboarder positioned in the center foreground, captured with a fisheye lens. In the middle ground, other skiers are visible on the slope, with ski lift towers in the top left and a mountain peak in the center-right background. The camera, initially held at the subject's height, follows them as they ride toward a ramp. As the snowboarder launches into a backflip, the camera inverts with them, causing the subject to move to the top of the frame while the snowy ground, a ramp, and another mid-air skier occupy the middle ground below. The shot concludes as the snowboarder lands, returning to the center foreground with the camera once again at their height and facing forward down the slope.
